name: Ogresfield Chronicles - The Last Witch
description:
This game is set in the 17th century. It is an alternate history fantasy JRPG. As in the 2D version, you start in a humble magical hamlet near Ogresfield city. This time the year is 1640 and you follow the story of the last witch and become the first Shadow Priest.

It is largely fictional but notable historical characters will be met on the journey.

As the shadow priest you must protect the last witch as we know in the realm of Ogresfield, no one is inherently evil for what they believe; it is their choices and actions that make them who they are.

Check out the original game set in this universe:

https://jbo.itch.io/ogresfield-chronicles

If you want to explore the story universe consider listening to this short story podcast made for YouTube. It is set in the modern day and inspired the creation of the previous game. WARNING it brings up serious life issues and is gritty and not for the faint-hearted.
